channel.title: whonixsetup Whonix Repository Tool --cli on first startup bug
channel.description: On first startup in CLI mode it has an error during whonixsetup. ``` Starting Whonix Repository Tool... ERROR: --repository must be either stable, testers or developers. ########################################################### ## Something went wrong. Please report this bug! ## ## BASH_COMMAND: whonix_repository ########################################################### ```

item.title: whonixsetup Whonix Repository Tool --cli on first startup bug
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Confirmed. Itâ€™s a bug.

To fix run the following commands.

sudo mkdir /var/cache/whonix-setup-wizard/status-files

sudo touch /var/cache/whonix-setup-wizard/status-files/whonix_repository.done

sudo whonixsetup

Will be fixed in Whonix 13.

github.com/Whonix/whonixsetup

no longer auto run whonix_repository cli tool from whonixsetup cli version 

because it's cli gui feature was removed. Suggest to run whonix_repository
manually.
by adrelanos on 01:10PM - 27 Dec 15
changed 1 files with 24 additions and 20 deletions.

Read full topic
item.source: whonixsetup Whonix Repository Tool --cli on first startup bug

item.title: whonixsetup Whonix Repository Tool --cli on first startup bug
item.dc:creator: David
item.description:
On first startup in CLI mode it has an error during whonixsetup.

Starting Whonix Repository Tool...
ERROR: --repository must be either stable, testers or developers.
###########################################################
## Something went wrong. Please report this bug!
##
## BASH_COMMAND: whonix_repository
###########################################################

Read full topic
item.source: whonixsetup Whonix Repository Tool --cli on first startup bug
